name: Bot Studio Library
description:
Template File for Nama Bot Studio Plugin


When the file loads, navigate the slides to understand how this file works along with the Nama Bot Studio plugin.


In this file you find:

  • a Conversational Components Library with a few Variants for building your chatbot.
  • the required File Structure (basically a page ending with .aiml with a few components)
  • a chatbot example, including AI datasets for intent prediction.



To get started with this newness...

Duplicate this template file and run the Nama Bot Studio plugin inside the duplicated file ðŸ¦¾
